title: runtime: bus error on freebsd/386 (10 and beyond)
body:
Not so occasionally, but it certainly happens.

ok  	regexp	0.064s
ok  	regexp/syntax	0.707s
--- FAIL: TestLockedDeadlock2 (0.09 seconds)
	crash_test.go:92: output does not start with "fatal error: all goroutines are asleep - deadlock!\n":
		signal: bus error
FAIL
FAIL	runtime	14.402s
?   	runtime/cgo	[no test files]

% hg id
d187b31342b5 tip

% uname -a
FreeBSD vm3 10.0-STABLE FreeBSD 10.0-STABLE #0 r262700: Mon Mar  3 15:41:20 JST 2014    
root@vm3:/usr/obj/usr/src/sys/GENERIC  i386
